    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Distance

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:NonNegativeInteger
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Distance

      • Description

        Used to provide distance and direction information.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Distance direction="Example String Value" distanceMax="1234" distanceMeasure="Example String Value" unitOfMeasureCode="Miles" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">1234</Distance>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Distance" : {
    "value" : 1234,
    "distanceMeasure" : "Example String Value",
    "direction" : "Example String Value",
    "distanceMax" : 1234,
    "unitOfMeasureCode" : "Miles"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        distanceMeasure
        When the Distance attribute contains a value, (presumably a numerical value), the unit of measure is a string value that indicate what units are used for the value.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        direction
        An optional string value used to indicate the compass point(s) direction, e.g.: S, SE (South, Southeast), FROM the Reference Point TO the hotel location if the search is not a full circumference from the reference point.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        distanceMax
        An optional attribute indicating the maximum distance to/from a reference point.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:positiveInteger
        Example Value 1234
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        unitOfMeasureCode
        The unit of measure in a code format. Refer to OpenTravel Code List Unit of Measure Code (UOM).
        Details
        Type UnitOfMeasure_Enum
        Example Value Miles
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
